page.title: 01THE VILLAGE
page.content:
At LYDEARD ST LAWRENCE there are some council houses called NETHERCOT WAY. Down from the council houses is the school. Next to the school there is a big house. Opposite the house is the church and the vicarage. Next to the vicarage is the village hall where they hold concerts and discos.
Next to the hall there is a big house called ST BEES. Opposite that is a TERRACE and a farm. Opposite there is the horse pond. By the horse pond is the POST OFFICE and the VILLAGE SHOP.
There are some more houses and a car park near the cricket field . By the car park there are old peoples bungolows. Finally there is a farm where there are some ducks.
